group_1.textRight: You can leave this to me!

group_1.textLeft: What're you riled up about now?

group_1.textRight: The thing is, Rena...
You know I sometimes help out at my@friend's flower shop, right?
Actually, I even helped out today!
And, guess what else! I've sold Christmas@wreaths, too!
So that makes me...
[chara:101101:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]A Christmas sales expert!
In other words, when it comes to selling@things...
I have way more experience than you two.
So it's my responsibility to guide the both@of you!
[chara:101101:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Because I know what I'm doing!

group_1.textLeft: Wh-what the heck?! Where'd this bragging@come from...?!
You're one to talk! You brag all the time.

group_1.textRight: Can I start now? So, the thing about@customer service is...
You need to have the guts to draw the@customers to you!
Yes, the guts.
But those calls I heard from you two...@Especially you, Rena...
Totally gutless!
So no wonder your voices didn't carry!

group_1.textLeft: It's not like you were shouting customers@down either!

group_1.textRight: I was holding back so you could shine.
If I use my true power...I can shout a@million billion times louder than that!
Yes! You can count on me!
But it'd be such a shame... Rena got all@dressed up so she should be the star...
But seeing how she can't call customers, I@guess it'll just have to be me...

group_1.textLeft: All right, that's enough! I'm the one they@should be looking at!

group_1.textRight: Is that so...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100950:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]Y-you just watch! I got this! Keep your eyes@on me, Kaede!
